1.title: Phoebe Robinson
1.plot: The multitalented star talks crying on cue, keeping cool in front of Michelle Obama, and working with one of the best in the biz.

2.title: on Location: 'Alita: Battle Angel'
2.plot: Star Rosa Salazar and the artists at WETA digital reveal how they brought the awe-inspiring world of 'Alita: Battle Angel' to life.

3.title: Shay Mitchell
3.plot: From "Pretty Little Liars" to "You," Shay Mitchell knows how to navigate the world of social media and determine which TV characters to follow.

4.title: Take 5 With Jeanine Mason
4.plot: Get to know Jeanine Mason through her eclectic mix of movie and TV favorites.

5.title: Norman Reedus
5.plot: The star of "The Walking Dead" gives an inside look at life on and off set after Andrew Lincoln's departure then dreams up an alternate reality for Daryl.

1.title: Ep. 101: Kevin Smith
1.plot: Kevin Smith stops by the studio to weigh in on Justice League and the future of DC and Marvel, and answer your questions. Plus, Kerri and fans battle over who played the greatest Batman of all time.

2.title: Ep. 102: Alan Tudyk
2.plot: A Thanksgiving weekend special: Alan Tudyk ranks his top five droids of all time, Tim tracks down the cast of 'Roman J. Israel, Esq.' and Kerri shares her favorite Thanksgiving episodes with memorable sitcom families.

3.title: Ep. 103: Amber Stevens West
3.plot: Amber Stevens West shares the goofy antics on the set of "Ghosted," Kerri heads to KNB EFX to try on alien prosthetics from "The Orville," and Tim breaks down what popular TV shows are ending their runs and what we can look forward to in 2018.

4.title: Ep. 104: Paul Scheer
4.plot: Paul Scheer lets us in on the secrets of 'The Disaster Artist' and shares his favorite awesomely bad movies. Plus, Kerri dives into the origins of cult midnight movies while Tim finds hidden connections among IMDb's Top 10 Stars of 2017.

5.title: Ep. 105: Katee Sackhoff
5.plot: Katee Sackhoff lets us in on what it's like to be a part of the 'Star Wars' universe and reveals the inspiration for her villainous character on "The Flash." Kerri and Tim get their Jedi on and learn what it takes to wield a lightsaber.

6.title: Ep. 106: Kay Cannon
6.plot: Writer Kay Cannon shares the real-life inspirations for your favorite 'Pitch Perfect' characters, you share your favorite female friendship movies, and Kerri uncovers the hidden connection between 'Juno' and 'Lady Bird.'

7.title: Ep. 107: Emily V. Gordon
7.plot: Writer Emily V. Gordon stops by to talk about her film 'The Big Sick' and why we should laugh at life's challenges. Plus, Kerri shows us how to binge your favorite shows like a pro.

8.title: Ep. 108: Golden Globes 2018
8.plot: IMDb award show expert Dave Karger stops by "The IMDb Show" to share his predictions for who will win a Golden Globe and what to watch before the big show.

9.title: Ep. 109: Chris Sullivan
9.plot: Actor Chris Sullivan gives "The IMDb Show" inside details about Season 2 of "This Is Us." Plus, Kerri takes a look at some of the most highly-anticipated TV shows of 2018, and we hit the red carpet to talk to Lena Waithe about her brand-new series, "The Chi."

10.title: Ep. 110: Jordan Horowitz
10.plot: Producer Jordan Horowitz gives "The IMDb Show" some "secret" information about his new spy-thriller series, "Counterpart." Plus, Kevin Smith lets us in on his favorite Sundance movies of all time.

11.title: Ep. 111: 2018 Sundance Film Festival
11.plot: Kerri Doherty and Tim Kash brave the freezing temperatures of Park City, Utah, to attend the world-famous Sundance Film Festival and give you the inside scoop.

12.title: Ep. 112: Rachel Bloom
12.plot: Comedy star Rachel Bloom gives "The IMDb Show" some inside details about Season 4 of "Crazy Ex-Girlfriend" and lets us in on her favorite TV couples of all time.

13.title: Ep. 113: Arielle Kebbel
13.plot: Arielle Kebbel dishes on how she told her parents she was going to be in 'Fifty Shades Freed,' and the cast of 'Black Panther' reveals the real-life heroes that inspired their characters.

14.title: Ep. 114: Jesse Plemons
14.plot: Jesse Plemons takes us behind the scenes of the upcoming Martin Scorsese film 'The Irishman,' and Saoirse Ronan picks her favorite Greta Gerwig movies.

15.title: Ep. 115: Winston Duke
15.plot: 'Black Panther' star Winston Duke takes us behind the scenes of Marvel's record-breaking movie, and Oscar nominee Guillermo del Toro emphasizes the importance of wearing comfy shoes at the Oscars.

16.title: Ep. 116: Ellen Page
16.plot: IMDb fan favorite Ellen Page takes us into the terrifying zombie-filled world of 'The Cured,' we meet the new bachelorette on "UnREAL," and we show you the movies you think should have been nominated for Best Picture.

17.title: Ep. 117: Olivia Cooke
17.plot: Olivia Cooke takes us behind the scenes of her new wickedly funny film 'Thoroughbreds' and hints at what's to come in 'Ready Player One.' The star-studded cast of 'A Wrinkle in Time' pick their most inspirational roles.

18.title: Ep. 118: Adria Arjona
18.plot: Adria Arjona goes head to head with massive monsters in 'Pacific Rim Uprising,' and John Boyega and Scott Eastwood face off in our Robot Battle Bracket.

19.title: Ep. 119: Zach Braff
19.plot: Zach Braff tackles acting and directing on his new show "Alex, Inc.," and we take a look at the 15 most bingeable TV shows of all time.

20.title: Ep. 120: Judd Apatow
20.plot: Judd Apatow celebrates the life of his mentor Garry Shandling, director Kevin Smith takes us behind the scenes of "The Flash," and we challenge the cast of 'Blockers' to the movie emoji game.

21.title: Ep. 121: Patton Oswalt
21.plot: Patton Oswalt celebrates the awkwardness of high school in his new comedy "A.P. Bio." The cast of 'A Quiet Place' talks about surviving the apocalypse, and we quiz you on some of the greatest celebrity yearbook photos.

22.title: Ep. 122: Lucy Hale
22.plot: Lucy Hale embraces her inner scream queen in her new horror film 'Truth or Dare,' Bruce Campbell teaches us how to be a B-movie legend, and you share your favorite scary movie moments. CORRECTION: 'Overboard' comes out May 4th.

23.title: Ep. 123: Paula Patton
23.plot: Paula Patton gets dark and gritty in her new film 'Traffik,' the cast of 'Super Troopers 2' recommend the perfect 4/20 movies, and we visit the set of "Superstore."

24.title: Ep. 124: Alessandro Nivola
24.plot: Alessandro Nivola takes us behind the scenes of his new film 'Disobedience,' the cast of 'Avengers: Infinity War' discuss their dream MCU roles, and we find out who your favorite movie rebels are.

25.title: Ep. 125: Pom Klementieff
25.plot: Pom Klementieff reveals her inspirations for her character Mantis, and we find out which MCU character would make the ideal best friend.

26.title: Ep. 126: Norman Lear
26.plot: Norman Lear revolutionized the American sitcom with "All in the Family," "The Jeffersons," and other classics. Norman invites Kerri Doherty and "The IMDb Show" to his home to kick back and reflect on his amazing career.

27.title: Ep. 127: Meet Captain Marvel
27.plot: Let's meet Carol Danvers, a.k.a. Captain Marvel, the first female lead in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. From her origin story that was first published in 1968 to the superpowers Brie Larson will wield in the March 2019 movie, we trace the history of Marvel's eponymous hero.

1.title: Natalie Dormer
1.plot: "Game of Thrones" star Natalie Dormer plays a blind woman who witnesses a murder in her new film 'In Darkness,' and the writers of 'Deadpool 2' teach us how to be superhero screenwriting legends.

2.title: IMDbrief: Meet Mysterio
2.plot: This is not a drill. The Web-Head will take on Mysterio in the 'Spider-Man: Homecoming' sequel, and Jake Gyllenhaal is circling the role. So, who is Mysterio? Let's unravel this tangled web in today's IMDbrief.

3.title: Tony Hale
3.plot: Tony Hale shines a spotlight on two of his most legendary characters: Buster Bluth and Gary Walsh. We also find out which movie characters the cast of 'Solo: A Star Wars Story' would want riding shotgun as their copilots.

4.title: 2018 Summer Movie Preview
4.plot: "The IMDb Show" hosts Kerri Doherty and Tim Kash get a cinematic base tan with resident film fanatic Kevin Smith and compare their picks for most anticipated movies of the summer.

5.title: IMDbrief: Meet Cheetah
5.plot: 'Wonder Woman 2' doesn't hit theaters until November 2019, but we've got questions. We know that Gal Gadot and director Patty Jenkins are back, the film is set in the 1980s, and Kristen Wiig is playing the bloodthirsty demigod Cheetah.

6.title: Toni Collette
6.plot: Toni Collette reveals how she got into character for the terrifying new film 'Hereditary,' and her co-star Alex Wolff picks the five performances that scare him the most.

7.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Ocean's 8'
7.plot: The cast of 'Ocean's 8' pick the iconic roles from cinematic history they would love to steal and make their own.

8.title: IMDbrief: 'Bill & Ted' Finally Set to Return
8.plot: A shoot date has been finally announced for a Bill and Ted threequel. So, let's hop in our time-traveling phone booth to hear all about it. It's Tuesday, June 5: Time for your IMDbrief.

9.title: Henry Winkler
9.plot: TV legend Henry Winkler takes "The IMDb Show" down memory lane to reveal how he defined the Fonz with a comb and suavely selects the coolest actors of all time.

10.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Hotel Artemis'
10.plot: The star-studded cast of the action-packed 'Hotel Artemis' try to guess movie titles using related keywords and phrases as clues. May the best actor win.

11.title: IMDb on Location: Marlon Wayans
11.plot: Marlon Wayans brings "The IMDb Show" behind the scenes of his new series "Marlon" and reveals how his family inspired the show.

12.title: IMDbrief: Surprising Video Game Sequels at E3 2018
12.plot: The Electronic Entertainment Expo or E3 opens Tuesday, June 12, at the Los Angeles Convention Center with 100s of new demos, panels, and conversations with the likes of legendary video game designer Hideo Kojima and actor Elijah Wood.

13.title: Alison Brie
13.plot: Alison Brie pulls back the perm to reveal the '80s origins of "GLOW," and Sydelle Noel answers five personal movie and TV questions.

14.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom'
14.plot: Bryce Dallas Howard and Chris Pratt wrack their brains to answer personal questions using only titles from their own movie and TV credits.

15.title: IMDbrief: How John Travolta's Passion Project Failed to Find an Audience
15.plot: Devised as John Travolta's awards contender, 'Gotti' opened in 11th place this weekend, while Pixar broke records with 'Incredibles 2', which grossed over $182 million. Though 'Gotti' had a tiny $10-million budget, its $1.7-million opening is among the lowest in Travolta's 40-year film career which has grossed $1 billion. All things being equal, the film was only offered in 503 U.S. theaters compared to the three to four thousand that most wide releases receive.

16.title: Yvonne Strahovski
16.plot: Yvonne Strahovski explains why she loves playing villains and gives us the inside scoop about what goes down on the set of "The Handmaid's Tale."

17.title: Take Five With Chrissy Metz
17.plot: Actress and author Chrissy Metz shares her love of scary animals and reveals her animated Disney crush when she answers five of the most essential film and TV questions.

18.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Sicario: Day of the Soldado'
18.plot: Frequent on-screen partners Josh Brolin and Benicio Del Toro reveal how they approach their characters from a new angle in 'Sicario: Day of the Soldado.'

19.title: IMDbrief: Meet Ghost
19.plot: Before you watch Marvel's 'Ant-Man and the Wasp,' get the lowdown on Ghost, the film's mysterious new villain, and the character's comic-book origins.

20.title: Chrissy Metz
20.plot: Chrissy Metz gives "The IMDb Show" the lowdown on Season 3 of "This Is Us" and ranks her top five saddest films of all time.

21.title: IMDb on Location: Shrinking at Doob-3D
21.plot: The hosts of "The IMDb Show" Tim Kash and Kerri Doherty get inspired by Ant-Man's shrinking powers and head to Doob-3D in Los Angeles to make themselves tiny.

22.title: IMDbrief: Best Movie Explosions
22.plot: Happy Fourth of July, America! On today's IMDbrief, we celebrate the U.S. of A. with a fireworks display courtesy of the Best Movie Explosions of All Time!

23.title: Lakeith Stanfield and Boots Riley
23.plot: The cast and director of 'Sorry to Bother You' reveal the highs and lows of following your dreams, the awkwardness of sex scenes, and their most soul-crushing jobs.

24.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation'
24.plot: Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, and Kathryn Hahn plan their dream summer getaways in some of the most interesting movie settings of all time.

25.title: IMDbrief: Remembering Steve Ditko
25.plot: This week, the world lost a comic book legend, so on today's IMDbrief, we remember Steve Ditko, Marvel Maestro.

26.title: Hannah John-Kamen
26.plot: 'Ant-Man and the Wasp' Star Hannah John-Kamen explains why her MCU character isn't a villain and reveals that she sang show tunes with Steven Spielberg on the set of 'Ready Player One.'

27.title: IMDb on Location: Creature Effects
27.plot: "The IMDb Show" host Kerri Doherty heads to Creature Effects in Los Angeles to control some of the coolest animatronic creatures featured in TV and film, including the horse Dolores rode in "Westworld."

28.title: IMDbrief: 7 Burning Comic-Con Questions
28.plot: We've got questions, and the Con holds the answers. In our latest IMDbrief, we offer seven burning movie questions we want answered at San Diego Comic-Con 2018.

29.title: Janina Gavankar
29.plot: Janina Gavankar explains the importance of films like 'Blindspotting' and her long love affair with video games.

30.title: IMDb on Location: 'Mission: Impossible - Fallout' Red Carpet
30.plot: On the Red Carpet in Paris the cast and crew of 'Mission: Impossible - Fallout' reveal the most exciting things about the film, from the death-defying stunts to the incredible locations.

31.title: IMDbrief: Tom Cruise's Best 'Mission: Impossible' Stunts
31.plot: This Summer, Tom Cruise is back as super-spy Ethan Hunt in 'Mission: Impossible - Fallout.' On today's IMDbrief: It's Tom Cruise's Best 'Mission: Impossible' Stunts of All Time.

32.title: Rob Reiner
32.plot: Legendary director and actor Rob Reiner shares the powerful political message behind his new film 'Shock and Awe' and imagines where his most celebrated characters are now.

33.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Mission: Impossible - Fallout'
33.plot: The cast of 'Mission: Impossible - Fallout' take us behind the scenes of the espionage epic to reveal what scares the fearless Tom Cruise and the truth behind Henry Cavill's infamous mustache.

34.title: IMDb on Location: "Double Dare"
34.plot: Former "Double Dare" host Marc Summers accepts the challenge of "Truth or Double Dare," where he must either answer show-related questions or take on ridiculous '90s-themed dares.

35.title: IMDbrief: Meet Black Manta
35.plot: The 'Aquaman' trailer made waves at San Diego Comic-Con but left us with questions about the movies mysterious villain Black Manta. In this edition of the IMDbrief we explore Black Manta's sinister comic-book origins.

36.title: Jimmi Simpson
36.plot: Emmy-nominated actor Jimmi Simpson spills insider "Westworld" details and the one weird problem of living with Charlie Day.

37.title: IMDb On Location: Movie Therapy
37.plot: The doctor is in! And that doctor is "therapist" and movie expert Kevin Smith, who's here to prescribe the best movies to fix life's problems.

38.title: IMDbrief: Picard to Return ... Boldly
38.plot: On today's IMDbrief, let's look at what the return of Captain Picard could mean for the future of "Star Trek."

39.title: Judith Light
39.plot: Emmy nominee Judith Light explains how she hid her emotions on "American Crime Story" and reacts to being compared to a dog on "Broad City."

40.title: Who, What, Where, When: Joey King
40.plot: Joey King talks about the terrifying tale of 'Slender Man,' sisterhood, and her most underrated role.

41.title: IMDb On Location: 'Mile 22'
41.plot: Tim Kash of the "The IMDb Show" immerses himself in the dangerous world of 'Mile 22' and learns how to choreograph a brutal film fight scene with star Iko Uwais and director Peter Berg.

42.title: IMDbrief: Flash or Fiction
42.plot: On today's IMDbrief, we break down what's truth and what's rumor for Warners Bros.' upcoming Flash feature film.

43.title: Regina King
43.plot: Regina King reveals what she thinks about artist activism and the seat-filler situation she couldn't keep her mind off of at the Emmys.

44.title: Take Five With Gemma Chan
44.plot: In our latest Take 5, Gemma Chan gets real with "The IMDb Show" about her favorite movies, her desire for a "Queer Eye" makeover, and her love of a certain animated rodent.

45.title: IMDb On Location: "Somebody Feed Phil"
45.plot: Phil Rosenthal, creator of "Everybody Loves Raymond" and host of "Somebody Feed Phil," takes us on a scrumptious cinematic journey and picks the five most delicious food films of all time.

46.title: IMDbrief: Which Movies Reversed This Summer's Box-Office Slump?
46.plot: August 2017 may have been the worst month for the box office in 20 years, but August 2018 is set to flip that script. On today's IMDbrief, we'll take a look at the inclusive films, fresh perspectives and true tales that are shaking up the box office.

47.title: Jane Levy
47.plot: Jane Levy shows the love for her streaming co-stars and plans to bring Pennywise to your next costume party.

48.title: Take Five With Adina Porter
48.plot: Emmy-nominated actress Adina Porter tells us about her childhood fantasies, her soap-opera obsession, and more.

49.title: Now Streaming
49.plot: "The IMDb Show" is here to help you browse less and binge more. Here's everything new worth watching this week on Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, Showtime, HBO, Sony Crackle, and more, including "The Innocents," "Tom Clancy's Jack Ryan," and "Ozark" Season 2.

50.title: IMDb On Location: 'The Happytime Murders'
50.plot: Host Tim Kash gets hands-on with one of the puppets from 'The Happytime Murders' and learns from a professional how to bring it to life. Lesson 1: Puppet farts are always funny.

51.title: IMDbrief: Meet the Demonic 'Nun' Haunting 'The Conjuring' Films
51.plot: 'The Nun' creeps into theaters on September 7, so on today's IMDbrief, let's meet the demon behind the habit at the dark center of 'The Conjuring' Universe.

52.title: Rob Riggle
52.plot: Funnyman and former U.S. Marine Rob Riggle used to tell people this one weird thing, and then he decided to turn it into a show.

53.title: IMDb On Location: The Cast of "Tom Clancy's Jack Ryan"
53.plot: The cast and crew of "Tom Clancy's Jack Ryan" reveal how they brought into the modern age a character that made his debut 34 years ago in the pages of "The Hunt for Red October."

54.title: IMDbrief: TIFF Travel Tips
54.plot: Here's everything you need before you set off for the Toronto International Film Festival to see Timothée Chalamet and Steve Carell team up, Jonah Hill make his directorial debut, and Viola Davis lead a heist thriller.

55.title: Anya Taylor-Joy
55.plot: Versatile actress Anya Taylor-Joy teases her anticipated upcoming roles and fondly remembers a bizarre scene from 'The Witch.'

56.title: IMDbrief: TIFF Predicts the Oscars
56.plot: Find out how the Toronto International Film Festival has become a predictor of Best Picture at the Academy Awards over the years.

57.title: IMDb On Location The Cast of "Kidding"
57.plot: At the red-carpet premiere of the new series "Kidding" the cast and crew reveal how they bring laughter and tears in Jim Carrey's bold return to TV.

58.title: IMDbrief: Can a Hard-R "Swamp Thing" Flip Script for DC TV?
58.plot: DC's waterlogged antihero will put the "graphic" in graphic novel for its new streaming service, but can a hard-R "Swamp Thing" flip the script on DC's trajectory? That's today's IMDbrief.

59.title: Michael Mando
59.plot: Michael Mando goes in on the moral dilemma of Nacho Varga and the moment he found out he was going to play Mac Gargan (aka Scorpion) in 'Spider-Man: Far From Home.'

60.title: 2018 Emmys Predictions
60.plot: Patton Oswalt and our hosts have all the predictions you need for the major categories at the 2018 Primetime Emmy Awards.

61.title: Salutes Our Emmy-Nominated Guests
61.plot: "The IMDb Show" celebrates the 2018 Emmy nominees who sat on our couch including Henry Winkler, Yvonne Strahovski, and Patton Oswalt.

62.title: IMDbrief: 2018 Emmys' Biggest Surprises
62.plot: Magic was in the air at "The 70th Primetime Emmy Awards," so on today's IMDbrief, we present the Emmys' biggest surprises.

63.title: Bill Pullman
63.plot: The star of "The Sinner" talks about what haunts his character and the characters on set who have haunted him in return.

64.title: IMDbrief: A Witch, a Maniac, and Bond, James Bond
64.plot: Mr. Bond, the fun has just begun. On today's IMDbrief, we cover 007's director, a killer new series on Netflix, and the big news you missed this week!

65.title: IMDb On Location: The Cast of 'Night School'
65.plot: 'Night School' stars Tiffany Haddish and Kevin Hart reveal what they were like in high school when they play a very special version of "Never Have I Ever."

66.title: IMDbrief: What 'The Eternals' Changes for Marvel
66.plot: On today's IMDbrief, Marvel made waves when they announced Chloe Zhao would direct their next movie last week, but what does 'The Eternals' really mean for the MCU?

67.title: Ben Schwartz
67.plot: Ben Schwartz is blown away by his 'Night School' co-star's daily routine and tries his hand at some iconic characters.

68.title: IMDb On Location: "Let's Make a Deal"
68.plot: Host Wayne Brady reveals how "Let's Make a Deal" is the perfect combination of improv comedy performance and classic game show. We also take a behind-the-scenes look at how "zonks," the show's worst prizes, are made.

69.title: IMDbrief: How Captain Marvel Stole Shazam's Name
69.plot: In Spring 2019, two new superheroes, Captain Marvel and Shazam, will hit the skies from opposing sides of the DC/Marvel showdown, and at one point, they both had the same name.

70.title: Nick Kroll
70.plot: "Big Mouth" creator and star Nick Kroll isn't afraid of getting very personal with the real-life stories that inspired his show.

71.title: IMDb On Location: "Shark Tank"
71.plot: "The IMDb Show" visits the set of "Shark Tank" to celebrate its tenth season and ask the sharks about their favorite shark movies.

72.title: IMDbrief: Meet Carnage
72.plot: 'Venom' teases the rise of a new Spider-Verse supervillain, so on today's IMDbrief, let's meet Carnage.

73.title: Kristen Bell
73.plot: "The Good Place" star Kristen Bell talks morality, butt spiders, and the fate of some of her most famous past characters from film and TV.

74.title: IMDb on Location: Halloween Costumes
74.plot: "The IMDb Show" host Danielle Robay hits the streets to find out what movie and TV characters you should transform into for Halloween.

75.title: Fall TV 2018
75.plot: "The IMDb Show" takes a look at its most anticipated shows of the fall TV season.

76.title: Candice Patton
76.plot: "The Flash" actress went from contest winner to superhero star and has had some unforgettable acting experiences along the way.

77.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Overlord'
77.plot: "The IMDb Show" heads to Fantastic Fest to gather some intel on World War II horror film 'Overlord' and learns which films the cast would watch to prepare for a zombie apocalypse.

78.title: Mackenzie Foy
78.plot: The young star was up for anything while exploring the gorgeous sets of 'The Nutcracker and the Four Realms.'

79.title: IMDb on Location: The Cast of 'Bohemian Rhapsody'
79.plot: The larger-than-life cast and the crew of 'Bohemian Rhapsody' reveal what they find most fascinating about Freddie Mercury and champion their favorite biopic films.

80.title: Take Five With Tika Sumpter
80.plot: The 'Nobody's Fool' star picks the shows and movies that give her nightmares, make her sing, and teach her some surprising things.

81.title: Take Five With Troye Sivan
81.plot: 'Boy Erased' star Troye Sivan proves he knows movies with these picture-perfect picks.

82.title: Kurt Sutter
82.plot: The "Mayans M.C." and "Sons of Anarchy" creator teases the finale of his newest show and tests his motorcycle knowledge on and off screen.

83.title: Jeffrey Wright
83.plot: The Emmy- and Tony-winner helps veterans with post-traumatic stress disorder tell their stories in his powerful new HBO documentary.

84.title: Take Five With Lulu Wilson
84.plot: "The Haunting of Hill House" star Lulu Wilson sings praises for 'La La Land,' picks Ellen Page as her dream co-star, and lets us in on why her mom is just like Dwight from "The Office."

85.title: Richard Madden
85.plot: The international star gives an inside look at his record-breaking new role, what convinced him to do 'Rocketman,' and which of his "Thrones" buddies he can still count on.

86.title: IMDb On Location: The Cast of 'Robin Hood'
86.plot: 'Robin Hood' stars Taron Egerton and Jamie Foxx give the classic tale of 'Robin Hood' a gritty and modern twist.

87.title: Jane Lynch
87.plot: The comedy actress gives us a peek inside her voiceover process, her encore in "The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel," and the unasked questions about her career.

88.title: Take Five With Michael Dorman
88.plot: "Patriot" star Michael Dorman dishes on his childhood movie crush, the glory of watching "The Simpsons," and his favorite Ninja Turtle.

89.title: Finn Wittrock
89.plot: The movie and TV star channels actors from another era in his latest role, and shows his appreciation for both Shakespeare and poop jokes.

90.title: Take Five With Megan Fox
90.plot: 'Transformers' star Megan Fox takes us on wild adventure with her new show "Legends of the Lost With Megan Fox," crushes on Jim Carrey, and gives us all a holiday gift.

91.title: Kevin Smith's Favorite Movies of 2018
91.plot: Kevin Smith breaks down his picks for the best movies of the year, including one massive hit and an unexpected runner-up.

92.title: STARmeter Award: Jacob Elordi
92.plot: Tim Kash of "The IMDb Show" presents the 2018 IMDb STARmeter Award in the Breakout Category to 'Kissing Booth' star Jacob Elordi.

93.title: IMDb On Location: Aquaman vs. Spider-Man
93.plot: In a battle for the ages the King of the Ocean squares off against your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man. "The IMDb Show" heads to the streets to find out who wins on this spectacular superhero standoff.

94.title: Take Five With Kevin Smith
94.plot: Movie maven Kevin Smith dives into the scenes and stars that made 2018 an epic cinematic year.

95.title: Emily Mortimer
95.plot: The new Jane Banks of 'Mary Poppins Returns' defends her fictional nanny and imagines how some of her other co-stars would fare as caretakers for her own kids.

96.title: Take Five With Jacob Elordi
96.plot: Jacob Elordi explains why Heath Ledger is his idol, the power of hit show "Supernatural," and his favorite holiday film.

97.title: Katheryn Winnick
97.plot: The martial arts master who plays Lagertha on "Vikings" shares stories of shooting in Dublin and some unexpected competition from Westeros.

98.title: IMDb On Location: Holiday Movies & Specials
98.plot: "The IMDb Show" festively hits the streets to find out your holiday movie and TV viewing traditions.

99.title: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II
99.plot: The stars of 'Aquaman' formed a special bond off-screen that let them push the limits of their rivalry once they were in costume.

100.title: IMDb On Location: Your Movie Character NYE Kiss
100.plot: "The IMDb Show" hits the streets to find out the movie characters you would like to kiss to ring in the new year.

101.title: TV & Film's Toughest Characters
101.plot: We throw down our picks for the toughest characters in TV and film history.

102.title: Golden Globes 2019
102.plot: The hilarious Lauren Lapkus creates masterpieces to pick the best of the best in our bonus categories for the Golden Globes.

103.title: Take Five With Felicity Jones
103.plot: From Kate Winslet to Wednesday Adams, 'On the Basis of Sex' star Felicity Jones reveals which actresses and characters she looks up to.

104.title: Nina Dobrev
104.plot: The former "Vampire Diaries" star breaks out her comedic side and finally gets to play an adult in her new sitcom.

105.title: Ben Barnes
105.plot: The versatile actor behind Logan Delos and Billy Russo shares stories from the set and celebrates the distinct quirks of his co-stars.

106.title: Regina Hall
106.plot: The 'Scary Movie' star shares her obsession with her newest co-worker and confesses her teenage attempts at looking like the queen of pop.

107.title: Lana Condor
107.plot: The rising star plays a fierce new character with help from the 'Avengers: Endgame' directors, all while preparing to reprise her role in 'To All the Boys I've Loved Before.'

108.title: IMDb on Location With Liam Neeson
108.plot: 'Cold Pursuit' star and acting legend Liam Neeson takes us on a journey through his most iconic roles over his 40-year career, including war heroes and Jedi Masters.

imdb.title: The IMDb Show
plot: "_The IMDb Show_ (qv)" is here to help you dive deeper into the shows and movies you love and discover new ones you won't be able to stop watching.
